extension.title: UML Sequence Diagrams
extension.description: This extension creates UML sequence diagrams using the free service at http://www.websequencediagrams.com/.

function.name: diagram
function.param: style for UML sequence diagram (one of 'default', 'earth', 'modern-blue', 'mscgen', 'omegapple', 'qsd', 'rose', 'roundgreen', or 'napkin'; default: 'default')
